hero.infrastructure: Our infrastructure adapts to various scenarios, including data protection with operational transparency

features.title: Data Protection with Cryptographic Proofs
features.subtitle: Silent authentication and traceability without public exposure.

items.title: UTXO
items.description: Used to represent assets between negotiating parties, ready to be transacted by the recipient upon proof of ownership.

items.title: ZKP Proofs
items.description: Allow parties to prove possession of specific information to contracts without revealing the information itself.

items.title: Asymmetric Keys
items.description: Used to enable information encryption and ensure that only the intended recipient can read it.

items.title: Hash Tree
items.description: Used to verify the existence of commitments associated with UTXOs and ensure information is received without damage or tampering.

items.title: Hashing
items.description: Resource applied in the production of commitments to be registered by the EVM, ensuring their authenticity and integrity while preventing reversals to original data.

items.title: Nullifiers
items.description: Used to authorize UTXO spending, representing them in a way that's decoupled from commitments to prevent transaction graph navigation.
